wikipedia_page.main: John Baird, DL, JP (17 February 1852 – 8 July 1900), was a Scottish Unionist politician.

Baird was the eldest son of John Baird, 1st of Ury, and wife Margaret Findlay, and elder brother of John Baird, DL, JP, Member of Parliament for North West Lanarkshire.the Peerage.com
